text: Previously, the date of February 11 was leaked.. The BlackBerry Curve 8900 has a full-QWERTY keyboard, GPS, Wi-Fi and 512MHz processor. It looks like the device does not support 3G but does have world quad band support. The 3.2-megapixel camera has image stabilization, digital zoom, flash and the ability to record video and play video, a music player, a 3.5mm stereo headset jack and headset, and a hot-swappable microSD/SDHC memory card slot with a 256MB card inserted that accept up to 16 GB. T-Mobile customers can get mobile coverage and unlimited nationwide Wi-Fi calling with T-Mobile's Unlimited HotSpot Calling.
title: T-Mobile has officially announce that they will launch the new RIM BlackBery Curve 8900 sometime in mid-February.
